tags.name: Workflow Service
tags.description: The workflow service provides endpoints for scheduling & managing orca workflows

post.description: Schedule a workflow run. Providing its name and JSON input

parameters.name: workflowName
parameters.description: The name of the workflow to schedule.

get.description: Returns the status of the specified workflow run.

parameters.name: workflowRunId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

get.description: Returns a full description of a workflow run, including tasks, child workflows etc.

parameters.name: workflowRunId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

input.description: The JSON encoded input to provide to the workflow.

runId.description: The unique identifier of the task run.

workflowRunId.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run this task was run within.

taskName.description: The name of the task being ran.

createdAt.description: When the task run was created.

scheduledAt.description: When the task run was scheduled.

startedAt.description: When the task run was started.

completedAt.description: When the task run was completed.

status.description: The status of the task run.

input.description: The JSON encoded input provided to the task run.

output.description: The JSON encoded output of the task run.

orcataskv1Run.title: The Run type represents the current state of a single task run

orcataskv1Status.description:
The Status enumeration represents the status of a task run.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: The task run has an unknown status.
 - STATUS_PENDING: The task run has been created and is awaiting scheduling.
 - STATUS_SCHEDULED: The task run has been scheduled and is awaiting execution.
 - STATUS_RUNNING: The task run is running.
 - STATUS_COMPLETE: The task run completed successfully.
 - STATUS_FAILED: The task run failed.
 - STATUS_SKIPPED: The task run was skipped due to a match on the idempotent key and task
name with a previous task ran.

runId.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

parentWorkflowRunId.description:
The unique identifier of the parent workflow run this workflow was run within. Assumed to be the root if this
is not provided.

workflowName.description: The name of the workflow being ran.

createdAt.description: When the workflow run was created.

scheduledAt.description: When the workflow run was scheduled.

startedAt.description: When the workflow run was started.

completedAt.description: When the workflow run was completed.

status.description: The status of the workflow run.

input.description: The JSON encoded input provided to the workflow run.

output.description: The JSON encoded output of the workflow run.

orcaworkflowv1Run.title: The Run type represents the current state of a single workflow run

orcaworkflowv1Status.description:
The Status enumeration represents the status of a workflow run.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: The workflow run has an unknown status.
 - STATUS_PENDING: The workflow run has been created and is awaiting scheduling.
 - STATUS_SCHEDULED: The workflow run has been scheduled and is awaiting execution.
 - STATUS_RUNNING: The workflow run is running.
 - STATUS_COMPLETE: The workflow run completed successfully.
 - STATUS_FAILED: The workflow run failed.
 - STATUS_SKIPPED: The workflow run was skipped due to a match on the idempotent key and workflow
name with a previous workflow ran.

description.description: The description of the workflow run and its child actions.

workflowRunId.description: The unique identifier of the newly created workflow run.

v1TaskRunDescription.description: The TaskRunDescription type represents full details of a task run.

workflowRun.description: A child workflow the parent ran.

v1WorkflowAction.description: The WorkflowAction type describes an action taken by a workflow. This is typically a child workflow or a task.

actions.description: The child workflows and tasks performed during this run. These will be ordered by their creation.

v1WorkflowRunDescription.description:
The WorkflowRunDescription type represents full details of a workflow run. Including the child workflows and
tasks that it executed.
